line.text: So now I have confessed that he is thine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And I my self am mortgaged to thy will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My self Ill forfeit so that other mine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou wilt restore to be my comfort still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But thou wilt not nor he will not be free
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thou art covetous and he is kind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: He learned but surety-like to write for me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Under that bond that him as fist doth bind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The statute of thy beauty thou wilt take
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou usurer that put forth all to use
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And sue a friend came debtor for my sake
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So him I lose through my unkind abuse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Him have I lost thou hast both him and me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: He pays the whole and yet am I not free
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
